testcase = int(raw_input())

while testcase > 0:
 
	input = raw_input()
	numbers = input.replace("x","*")
	numbers = numbers.replace("X","*")
	#print numbers
	result = eval(numbers)
	
	if (result == 0):
		print "Robot hanged."
	
	else:
		 print str(result).rstrip("0")[-1]
		
	testcase -= 1
